title: (x) "BeautiControl" close to Carolus and Aperto - Trajan {Katelynn Martin}
content:
Can you help me with this logo?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025043111im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BC%20WEB%20LOGO_5493.jpg)

 [‹ (x) prolightseminar.com font - Black Chancery {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025043111/http:/typophile.com/node/48047 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tarmac semi serif logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025043111/http:/typophile.com/node/48002 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tmiller676

comments.content: Looks pretty much like [Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025043111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/trajan/) to me, but I can’t tell if the “T” fits, since it is rather small.
I think we can safely assume this _is_ Trajan.
Thanks! Tried their auto tool, but that one didn’t come up.
